name: USAGI
description:
USAGI (pronounced  uu-sah-gee) is a roguelike about a warrior mage rabbit with five special abilities. Use treasure you find along the way to level up and raise your fighting  skills to defeat swarms of monsters in a maze like dungeon.

-Turned based action

-Levels are procedurally generated

-Death is permanent

You are given five skills to survive. Eventually a boss will spawn after level 15 or so and if you can kill it, you win. 

This was a my first time submission to the Seven Day Roguelike Challenge 2018. 

This game was built upon an existing projected I played around with but never completed. 

I plan to release this game on iOS if there is enough interest.

Thank you,

@robotmechanic
